title: boyka
description: Ultimate Test Automation framework for Web, API, Android and iOS platforms

features.title: Configurable
features.description: All the capabilities and server flags are configurable via config file in any of the following formats: yaml, json, xml and properties.

features.title: Battery aware
features.description: Has battery awareness for real device as the test execution will terminate if battery level is less than 20% and the device is not on charge.

features.title: Video Record
features.description: Provides facility to allow video recording of tests on Android and iOS.

features.title: Multi Language
features.description: Allows running tests on different languages on Android and iOS platform.

features.title: Cloud Support
features.description: Provides facility to run tests on Cloud platforms like BrowserStack.

features.title: Multi device support
features.description: Supports automation of mobiles and tablets for real devices or simulators / emulators for Android and iOS platforms.

features.title: Control Mobile Network
features.description: Provides facility to control mobile networks by allowing to toggle ON / OFF WiFi, Mobile Data, Airplane mode and Location services.

features.title: Screenshots
features.description: Provides facility to capture screenshot while test execution or on test failure

features.title: Page object modal
features.description: Promotes clean code practices by enforcing page object model where all the locators are stored in their respective activity classes.

features.title: Parallel execution
features.description: Provides parallel and sequential execution of tests on same or multiple devices

features.title: Logging events
features.description: Provides logging support using Log4J 2 to log all events occurred during test execution.

features.title: Inbuilt verification
features.description: Provides inbuilt verification for inline assertion of element properties.

features.title: Video streaming
features.description: Live video stream running tests on Android devices
